duties_responsibilities.duty: Obtaining, reviewing, and processing healthcare professional credentials.
Primary source verification of backgrounds through calling hospitals, licensing boards, etc.
Ensuring timely and accurate submission of hospital privilege applications for each physician.
Monitoring and reporting on the credentialing progress of each candidate.
Inspecting provider applications and resumes for completion, consistency, and accuracy.
Running queries, reviewing NPDB reports, and conducting compliance and sanctions monitoring.
Initiating the state board licensing process and expediting the licensure application process.
Coordinating submission of all verifications required by the state board and following up to assess licensure status.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Healthcare Management, Business Administration, or related field (Master's preferred)
